column5: Hope everyone is going to get spoiled with family time, a BBQ and maybe a couple new shiny lures! Have fun.

it's odd this yr, I'm doing all sorts of stuff on my own and the BBQ I'm going to is for my sports club get together?! who the heck coordinated that?  as for lures "I" bought some replacements a week ago LOL. BTW yes I do have kids too
Going camping and fishing with my boy!!!  Can't wait!
Awesome Nick. That boy is gonna love nature when he grows up.  My first father's day... She's only 6 days old, so I'm not expecting any really good lures, maybe some walleye rigs or something....

Going to my daughter's father in law, With my other kids. They a  have pool and an outdoor gazebo as big as a small house with a built in woodbirning oven for pizza . . . Sort of a small family gathering for a day! Beats  having them all (14) at my place every Sunday!

Happy fathers day to all as well.My two boys will be arriving last week of June for a week.I hear there's something in the mail?.Will be fun to hit the lake together when the get here.Good enough for me. Hopefully I will have a new fish finder installed by then.  .
treated myself to a new Shimano Symmetre reel from LeBaron today.  $109  no tax sale till tomorrow
